backend/main.mo: Defines casino backend types and storage maps for profiles, settings, assets, symbols, and config, with authorization and storage mixins and symbol-set read/update APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking two frontend files to requirements about generating and serving a static fallback logo asset.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing behavior and responsibilities of all frontend components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions configuring OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, loading state with cache‑busted logo, theme application, and rendering header, lobby, footer, banners, and profile setup.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUnloc: Dialog for entering a session password to unlock admin settings with validation and error messaging. Requires both admin permission and correct password.
frontend/src/components/admin/AppAssetsE: Admin tool to upload or import images for app assets, track progress, and update stored asset metadata. Supports overwrite or create behavior based on existing assets.
frontend/src/components/admin/BottomBann: Admin editor for configuring a bottom banner, including enabling, image upload/import, preview, and destination URL. Saves updated banner config via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/admin/GameCatalo: Provides an editor UI to manage default and persisted game catalog entries, supporting image upload, URL import, and form updates.
frontend/src/components/admin/GradientEd: Offers a visual and raw CSS gradient editor that parses, edits, and serializes gradient values with direction and color-stop controls.
frontend/src/components/admin/SymbolSetE: Enables editing of symbol sets per game, including adding, removing, reordering, renaming, and uploading images with previews.
frontend/src/components/admin/ThemeEdito: Allows viewing and modifying global theme config including colors and gradients, with preset selection and server-side persistence.
frontend/src/components/AdminSettingsMod: Admin modal providing tabbed UI to edit casino settings, branding, theme, banners, symbols, catalog, and images.
frontend/src/components/BottomBanner.tsx: Renders a clickable bottom banner using admin‑configured settings and cache‑busted external image blobs.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing static DexFans 2026 text.
frontend/src/components/GameWrapper.tsx: Layout wrapper for game screens showing back navigation and diamond balance, plus a hook for recording game outcomes. Provides balance and async recording state.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar handling login/logout, admin unlock flow, and dynamic asset-based branding. Displays user balance, wallet modal, and admin settings access.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to set a username and submit profile creation. Handles simple form validation and loading state.
frontend/src/components/ThemeApplier.tsx: Fetches theme config and applies it to the document root on load. Contains no UI and runs once at app root.
frontend/src/components/WalletModal.tsx: Wallet modal showing balances, wagering stats, and transaction history with deposit/withdrawal actions. Supports filtering transactions and validating min amounts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminUnlock.ts: Provides simple session-based admin unlocking with a fixed password and lock/unlock state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, storing identities, handling login flows, and exposing identity state via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for user profile, balance, transactions, game history, and mutations like register, deposit, withdraw, and record game outcomes using an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes and applies global background and text styles.
frontend/src/lib/animations.ts: Implements a canvas-based particle system with explosion, confetti, and sparkle effects plus a React hook to manage it.
frontend/src/lib/appAssets.ts: Defines canonical app asset metadata, fallback paths, and helpers for retrieving asset data and versioned URLs.
frontend/src/lib/gradientUtils.ts: Utility functions for parsing, serializing, extracting colors from, and generating simple CSS gradients.
frontend/src/lib/theme.ts: Applies theme configuration to CSS variables and returns the effective theme, currently global-only.
frontend/src/lib/themePresets.ts: Provides predefined theme presets with color and gradient configs plus a lookup helper.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/GameLobby.tsx: Renders the main game lobby, loading user data and catalog assets to display available games and launching selected game components.
frontend/src/pages/games/BlackjackGame.t: Implements a playable blackjack game with betting, card drawing, scoring logic, animations, and outcome recording.
frontend/src/pages/games/DiceRollGame.ts: Provides a dice-rolling betting game with animated dice, over/under prediction logic, and outcome recording.
frontend/src/pages/games/JackpotGame.tsx: Runs a 5‑reel jackpot slot game with symbol matching, animations, winnings calculation, and outcome logging.
frontend/src/pages/games/SlotsGame.tsx: Implements a 3‑reel slots game with animated spins, symbol matching, payout logic, and recorded results.
frontend/src/pages/games/WheelSpinGame.t: React component implementing a wheel‑spin betting game with canvas rendering, spin animation, particle effects, and backend outcome recording.
frontend/src/utils/cacheBusting.ts: Provides helpers to append version tokens to URLs for cache‑busting, including utilities for ExternalBlob URLs.
frontend/src/utils/imageUrlImport.ts: Validates and fetches an image from a URL, enforces size/type limits, and converts it into an ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/utils/sanitizeSvg.ts: Sanitizes SVG strings by rejecting unsafe tags/attributes and returning safe or fallback SVG output.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, supporting both query and hash routing with sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Describes the project's state, features, and architecture for the casino dApp backend and frontend.
